title: Crysis 1.21 Crack
description:
This crack is for version 1.21 of crysis. There are 2 cracks in the torrent and you can use whichever one you want it makes no difference. 

i found that after using the original crack provided by razor after updating game to version 1.21 i got this message stating that the game failed to load due to the lack of a game dll.

So by using this crack i don&#039;t get the message, the game starts up and runs perfectly and i don&#039;t have to have a dvd mounted in a virtual drive.

Simple to install. Just go into program files, electronic arts...then locate crysis bin32 folder and overwrite crysis.exe with the crack in the torrent.

i take no credit for this. i Just uploaded it to here.
